about_the_game:
The Game is Now Available for Early Access!


  • 3 chapters of linear main storyline, with 30 main levels
  • 10 different playable characters
  • A talent tree system with 26 unique large talent points
  • A chip system with over 100 attribute-enhancing entries
  • 30 additional challenging free-play levels

Game Introduction


Mystery of Dust is an RPG game with tower defense strategy elements. Players take on the role of "Lisha Komo," a girl caught in an "intelligent machine rebellion" sweeping the city. Granted the powerful "Memory Core," she uses "Heroic Memories" from past wars to fight. Due to her unique abilities, she forms a team to resolve the rebellion and uncover its source.

Game Features

2D Tower Defense Battles


Deserts, factories, nights, days... Use your Memory Core to strategize and defeat various enemies!

Unique Memory Cores


10 playable Memory Cores, each with a unique skill. Understand their uses and form a cohesive team!

Chip Equipment


A chip system with over 100 attribute-enhancing entries. Unique set chip effects can drastically change combat styles.

Talent System


A large talent tree to customize your team's strengths and weaknesses, supporting your strategy.

Challenge Levels


Free-play levels graded by difficulty, offering additional rewards.

Linear Storyline


Follow Lisha's journey through a captivating storyline.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100/AMD Ryzen5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050/AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100/AMD Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A sudden mechanical rebellion. An ordinary girl who has gained power. Faced with a "world-class" crisis. Is there a secret behind the rebellion? Is the power gained safe? Can a few people's journey save the world? Find out in our Tower Defense game-- Mystery of the Dust!
